trans-unit.source: You can associate your login information with an existing user account by entering your user name and password.
trans-unit.target: You can associate your login information with an existing user account by entering your user name and password.

trans-unit.source: You have been successfully authenticated, however this identity is not a member of this site. You can either associate this identity with an existing user account by providing the user name and password, or you can register as a new member.
trans-unit.target: You have been successfully authenticated, however this identity is not a member of this site. You can either associate this identity with an existing user account by providing the user name and password, or you can register as a new member.

trans-unit.source: You cannot login to the site from this IP address.
trans-unit.target: You cannot login to the site from this IP address.

trans-unit.source: Login Failed. Please remember that passwords are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Login Failed. Please remember that passwords are case sensitive.

trans-unit.source: Your password expired on {0}. Please update your password before continuing.
trans-unit.target: Your password expired on {0}. Please update your password before continuing.

trans-unit.source: Your password will expire on {0}. Please update your password before continuing.
trans-unit.target: Your password will expire on {0}. Please update your password before continuing.

trans-unit.source: You must enter a valid password. Please contact the Site Administrator if you do not know the password requirements.
trans-unit.target: You must enter a valid password. Please contact the Site Administrator if you do not know the password requirements.

trans-unit.source: Password values entered do not match.
trans-unit.target: Password values entered do not match.

trans-unit.source: You must provide your current password in order to change the password.
trans-unit.target: You must provide your current password in order to change the password.

trans-unit.source: The new password is the same as the old password. Please enter a different password.
trans-unit.target: The new password is the same as the old password. Please enter a different password.

trans-unit.source:
Password has been sent to
your email address.
trans-unit.target:
Password has been sent to
your email address.

trans-unit.source: Please update your password before continuing.
trans-unit.target: Please update your password before continuing.

trans-unit.source: The unique token that identifies the user.
trans-unit.target: The unique token that identifies the user.

trans-unit.source: Please update your profile before continuing.
trans-unit.target: Please update your profile before continuing.

trans-unit.source: This account has been locked out after too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please wait {0} minutes before trying to login again. If you have forgotten your password, please try the Password Reminder option before contacting the Site Administrator.
trans-unit.target: This account has been locked out after too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please wait {0} minutes before trying to login again. If you have forgotten your password, please try the Password Reminder option before contacting the Site Administrator.

trans-unit.source: You are not currently authorized to login to this site.
trans-unit.target: You are not currently authorized to login to this site.

trans-unit.source: Error associating identity with user. Remember that user names and passwords are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Error associating identity with user. Remember that user names and passwords are case-sensitive.

trans-unit.source: This account has been locked out after too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please contact the Site Administrator.
trans-unit.target: This account has been locked out after too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please contact the Site Administrator.
